questionTitle: You have left __________________ on the lawn. You must get rid of it.
Why so __________________? It is nothing, I'm just doing my job.
There are two __________________ in the cowshed.
Only __________________ is playing in the covered playground.
When the cat is away, the __________________ will play.
The court didn't have __________________, but this man was convicted nevertheless.
We take care of ourselves. That is why we have got into the habit of eating__________________.
